description: Defines the AppDatabase class for managing SQLite database connections using sqflite package, including singleton pattern for database instance initialization, database creation logic, and closing method.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: Provides a singleton interface for database access, creation, and closure using sqflite.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Asynchronously returns the singleton instance of the database, creating it if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the database connection and resets singleton reference.
